metadata.title: CVE-2022-2200 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If an object prototype was corrupted by an attacker, they would have beenable to set undesired attributes on a JavaScript object, leading toprivileged code execution. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 102,Firefox ESR < 91.11, Thunderbird < 102, and Thunderbird < 91.11.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
